    Class
    Description
    class 
    KtMat4
    Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional matrices.
    Methods in camzup.kotlin with parameters of type Mat4
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    KtMat4
    KtMat4.minus(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new matrix with the subtraction of the right operand from the instance.
    void
    KtMat4.minusAssign(Mat4 b)
    Subtracts the right operand from the instance (mutates the matrix in place).
    KtMat4
    KtMat4.plus(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new matrix with the addition of the right operand to the instance.
    void
    KtMat4.plusAssign(Mat4 b)
    Adds the right operand to the instance (mutates the matrix in place).
    KtMat4
    KtMat4.times(Mat4 b)

    Returns a new vector with the product of the instance and the right operand.
